text:
Philippe Harache, born the 12th of April 1954 at Orbec, is a French aerospace engineer and businessman. He is the former Vice-President of Eurocopter.
Graduate from Institut polytechnique des sciences avancées (1976), Paris 1 Pantheon-Sorbonne University, INSEAD and Harvard University, Philippe Harache started his career in 1978 as Helicopter engineer.
In 1982, he was President of Samaero at Singapore.
He became Vice-President of Eurocopter in 2001. He retired in 2010.
Since 2002, he has also been an adviser of France.
